data.eml:eml: A new Pseudophoxinus (Teleostei, Cyprinidae) species from Asi River Drainage (Turkey)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kuecuek, Fahrettin, Gueclue, Salim Serkan (2014): A new Pseudophoxinus (Teleostei, Cyprinidae) species from Asi River Drainage (Turkey). ZooKeys 411: 57-66, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.411.6833, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.411.6833
